body.name: DEANIC 2-in-1 Bidet Attachment for Toilet Bath Bidet Sprayer, Ultra-Slim Toilet Bidet Sprayer Attachment, Adjustable Cold Fresh Water Pressure,Non-Electric Bidet Toilet Seat
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Upgrowed Design】 DEANIC ultra-slim bidet has a retractable nozzle and handheld bidet sprayer. All you have to do is select the ideal water pressure and cleaning mode,enjoy the healthier life.
【Thin &Durable】This bidet sprayer for toilet is only a quarter-inch thick! The unique design provides support, maintains the toilet seat level and fits more comfortably with standard toilets.
【Environment Protection】The toilet attachment replaces toilet paper with water. Using our 2-in-1 toilet bidet to clean your skin makes feel more gentle, and comfortable. No need for electricity.
【Multipurpose】For urinary tract infection prevention, Pregnancy and postpartum cleaning, hemorrhoid relief.Also don't worry how to clean toilet sprayer bidet, toilet , bathroom , baby cloth , dog.

【Easy to Install】 DEANIC provides simple and detailed installation instructions for your convenience. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact with us by email, we will reply you within 24 hours.
body.description: Bidet Attachment for Toilet, Ultra-Slim Bidet for Toilet 2 Cleaning Modes Rear Mode: Suitable for pressure washing your buttocks, say goodbye to toilet paper, comfortable and healthy. Sprayer Mode: Suit for cleaning toilet, floor drain, mop, pets etc. Note: Hose is connected to product model 3/8” (major diameter: 16.66mm, minor diameter: 14.95mm), hose is connected to tee side bud nut model 9/16” (major diameter: 14.29mm, minor diameter: 13.39mm)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Package contains 1x Bidet 2x Stainless Steel Hose 1x Stainless Steel T-adapter 1x Sprayer Bidet Attachment for Toilet, Ultra-Slim Bidet for Toilet 2 Cleaning Modes Rear Mode: Suitable for pressure washing your buttocks, say goodbye to toilet paper, comfortable and healthy. Sprayer Mode: Suit for cleaning toilet, floor drain, mop, pets etc. Note: Hose is connected to product model 3/8” (major diameter: 16.66mm, minor diameter: 14.95mm), hose is connected to tee side bud nut model 9/16” (major diameter: 14.29mm, minor diameter: 13.39mm)

Easy to Install The toilet bidet can be quickly installed in 10 minutes. Please refer to our manual for installation. Adjustable Cleaning Modes Rear Mode is suitable for cleaning private areas. Sprayer mode is more versatile, it can be used to rinse the buttocks and can also be used to clean toilets, wash pets, etc. Suit for Everyone The bidet provides great feeling for the disabled and pregnant, menstruating women, the old. Our bidet attachment for toilet gives you a refreshing feeling and provides you a healthier lifestyle.
Toilet Floor Drain Cleaing Mop Pet

Q&A The benefits of toilet bidet 1: Using a bidet can reduce the use of toilet paper in the home by 80%. 2: The water pressure can be adjusted according to individual needs, and you will feel very relaxed after rinsing very clean 3: Applicable to most people, pregnant women, the elderly are able to use. How to install it? Quick installation in ten minutes. Step 1: Close the outlet valve and drain the water from the toilet tank. Step 2: Remove Toilet Seat. Step 3: Attach the buttler. Step 4: Connect Water Supply. How to use it? You can adjust two modes by rotating left and right: rear mode and sprayer mode. You can also adjust the amount of water output. Is it easy to install? The product comes with detailed instructions and is easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s work perfect
reviews.reviewText: It’s easy to installationThis is a great product with both the spray and bidet options .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, great customer service
reviews.reviewText: The beset was very easy to install. It took me about 10 minutes and it was done. It worked perfect but the sprayer had a very small leak coming out of the front so I emailed the company and with in a day they sent me a new sprayer. This beset works great and is well worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy install and quality parts
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product with both the spray and bidet options . The parts were good quality compared to the replacement which was a top 10 product on Amazon. The one star less is for the spray handle which seems the only part which is cheap plastic. But rest was easy to install and easy to use. Good buy for the price cheaper by 20% than the bidet only product I had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it while it worked
reviews.reviewText: Edited to add: I changed my rating due to the company messaging me and gave a partial refund to make it right for the malfunction/leak :) they honestly didn't have to but I am very thankful for them to do that and make it right. :)I really liked this bidet but unfortunately after 2 months something in it broke and started leaking. I would try and use the handheld sprayer and where the knobs were to change the setting would have water spraying out of it all over my bathroom :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars everyone should have one
reviews.reviewText: I had one in my condo for a year now, works beautiful, and just moved so I got one for each bath. Installation is easy, though this time in my place I had a handyman install it. It is easy to install but I was didn't want to bother with that and had the handyman install it as part of a package of several other chores. I had another version without the hose sprayer one which I installed myself in my past place but this one with the hose part surpasses the other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This item will start leaking water in just a few months of use
reviews.reviewText: Folks,Pls don't buy this product. I have purchased several of these over the last year or so and consistently found them leaking water after a few months of use. I thought of first item water leak as an exception but then another one had same issue and it repeated once again for a third one. Most importantly, there is no contact information available for the seller. Amazon doesn't have it or won't share it.Stay away from this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars T-adapter faulty, sprayer issues as others stated, toilet tank doesn’t want to fill up now
reviews.reviewText: Thankfully I had an existing bidet attachment that the hose attached to fine.The sprayer has no pressure at all no matter what setting.The angle of the behind sprayer could be better.And for some reason my toilet tank no longer wants to fill.This is the second brand of combo bidet sprayer/attachment I have had and it seems there may just be an issue with this. I have just the attachment in another bathroom for years and no issues. But I prefer to have the option of both in this bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had it installed by a professional. It is an amazing cheaper version of a bidet. Save a fortune on toilet paper and don’t know why I did not get it ages ago. Highly recommend. Excellent value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very easy to install. connected to the water pipe that is feeding the toilet flush system.I wish if it can be connected to hot and cold water, but this is not the case.no leakes. easy to use and vey hygenic. Hand held bidet is excellent addition to the system.Highly recommended .time will tell how sturdy it is.I expect it to last good 2 years ... for the price of 40 pounds... this is good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Love the dual mode for cleaning. But...
reviews.reviewText: Had to get professional to install. The Connector provided didn't fit the previous connection. The pressure in shower isn't great. But the nozel pressure is good. Overall I'm satisfied but connector should have been better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Attached it to a pump to increase the pressureWorking perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: This is a great bum product
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install without the help of a plumber if you are any sort of DIYer, unobstrusive and easy to use, leaves you feeling fresh and clean. Not sure it saves on paper.
